channel.title: [317] changing max skill level [alllstar]
channel.description:
Playing around with an allstar base source I've coded with for about 5 months. One of our top problems is combat glitches because the max skill level is 200.
Is there a way I can lower combat skills back down to 99 and fix the infinite hp glitch? Or is something else causing it? Please help xP thanks
